description: Lists all of your scheduled audits. Requires permission to access the ListScheduledAudits action.

nested_items.name: scheduledAuditName
nested_items.description: The name of the scheduled audit.

nested_items.name: scheduledAuditArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the scheduled audit.

nested_items.name: frequency
nested_items.description: How often the scheduled audit occurs.

nested_items.name: dayOfMonth
nested_items.description: The day of the month on which the scheduled audit is run (if the frequency is 'MONTHLY'). If days 29-31 are specified, and the month does not have that many days, the audit takes place on the 'LAST' day of the month.

nested_items.name: dayOfWeek
nested_items.description: The day of the week on which the scheduled audit is run (if the frequency is 'WEEKLY' or 'BIWEEKLY').

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that can be used to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
